name: AdventureRunner
description:
Note: Game runs in window fullscreen.

W / UpArrow: Jump, doublejump, hold to jump higher.
A / LeftArrow: Move left
D / RightArrow: Move Right
ESC : Pause / Resume
- / + : Decrease / Increase volume

Goal: Get 2500 score to win (Starting difficulty 4 or lower only).

Updates:
24/2/2022: Decided to publish to public. (I may change it back to unlisted)
